dcterms:creator: Felipe de Morais
Patricia A. Jaques
dcterms:description: The dataset captures the dynamics of Brazilian students' emotions in a digital learning system, focusing on the interaction between gender and the duration of emotions.
dcterms:title: PAT2Math

dcterms:creator: Jaclyn Ocumpaugh
dcterms:description: BROMP is a technical and training manual for the Baker-Rodrigo-Ocumpaugh Monitoring Protocol, which is used for annotating students' emotions in real-time during their interactions with a computer-based learning environment.
dcterms:title: BROMP (Baker-Rodrigo-Ocumpaugh Method and Protocol)

dcterms:creator: Ryan S.J. Baker
Jaclyn Ocumpaugh
Sujith M. Gowda
Amy M. Kamarainen
Shari J. Metcalf
dcterms:description: This dataset includes various logs from computer-based learning environments (CBLEs) to extend log-based affect detection to multi-user virtual environments for science.
dcterms:title: Various datasets from CBLEs

dcterms:creator: Luc Paquette
Ryan S.J. Baker
Michael A. Sao Pedro
Janice D. Gobert
Lisa Rossi
Adam Nakama
Zakkai Kauffman-Rogoff
dcterms:description: This dataset includes various logs from Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITS) for sensor-free affect detection in a simulation-based science inquiry learning environment.
dcterms:title: Various datasets from Intelligent Tutoring Systems (ITS)

dcterms:creator: E. Jensen
S. Hutt
S. Dâ€™Mello
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of data from Algebra Nation, focusing on generalizable affect detection for a large number of students across an entire school year.
dcterms:title: Data from Algebra Nation

dcterms:creator: Mihaela Cocea
Stephan Weibelzahl
dcterms:description: This dataset includes data from various CBLEs, such as HTML-Tutor and ASSISTments, focusing on disengagement detection in online learning.
dcterms:title: Data from various CBLEs (e.g., HTML-Tutor, ASSISTments)
